content: 19 ssk k1 turn there are 7 9 11 13 15 unworked sts remaining a�ter the gap round 2 wrong side sl1 p3 p2tog p1 turn there are 7 9 11 13 15 unworked sts remaining a�ter the gap round 3 right side sl1 k to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn round 4 wrong side sl1 p to 1 before the gap p2tog p1 turn a�ter working rnds 1 to 4 once repeat rnds 3 and 4 until there is a total of 12 14 16 18 20 sts on the needle cut cc yarn the next round is a right side round all images and text copyright songsparrow knits 2025 no part of this pattern may be distributed or reproduced gusset with mc k all sts across the heel �lap then pick up 12 13 14 15 16 sts along the first side of the heel �lap place a marker this is the new bor k all sts across until the heel �lap pick up another 12 13 14 15 16 sts along the second side of the heel �lap then k to the bor work the gusset decreases as follows round 1 k22 26 30 34 38 sts across the front of the sock k1 ssk k to 3 sts before the end of round k2tog k1 round 2 k all sts without decreasing repeat rnds 1 and 2 until there are 44 52 60 68 76 sts foot section 1 join cc and k4 5 5 6 6 row in st st use your favourite method for creating jogless/stepless stripes cut the cc yarn or carry it inside your work until the next stripe section 2 with mc k10 12 15 18 20 rnds repeat the previous two steps i e cc and mc sections twice more or until the sock is the desired length the foot section should reach the beginning of the wearer s toes toe join cc and k44 52 60 68 76 sts during this round divide the sts evenly so that there are 11 13 15 17 19 sts on each needle or if working with magic loop place markers to divide the sts into four equal sections without moving the bor round 1 decrease k1 ssk k until 3 sts before the 2nd marker k2tog k2 ssk k to 3 sts before the end of the round k2tog k1 round 2 k all sts repeat rnds 1 and 2 until there are 24 28 32 36 40 sts remaining finishing gra�t the remaining sts together using kitchener st weave in loose ends with a sharp tapestry needle work all instructions again from the beginning for the second sock all images and text copyright songsparrow knits 2025 no part of this
